brands.disclaimer: iTunes® is  a registered trademark of Apple Inc.  All right reserved.  Apple is not a participant in or sponsor of this promotion.
brands.description: Give the gift of one-stop entertainment. Each card includes a code redeemable for music, movies, TV shows, games, apps, and more on the iTunes Store, the iBooks Store, the App Store, and the Mac App Store. Recipients can access their content on an iPod, iPad, or iPhone, and watch or listen on a computer—Mac or PC.
brands.shortDescription: iTunes Codes are perfect for anyone who enjoys music, movies, TV shows, games, apps, and books. And each card can be redeemed on the iTunes Store, App Store, iBooks Store, and the Mac App Store.
brands.terms: Valid only on iTunes Store for U.S. Requires iTunes account and prior acceptance of license and usage terms. To open an account you must be 13+ and in the U.S. Compatible software, hardware, and Internet access required. Not redeemable for cash, no refunds or exchanges (except as required by law). Code may not be used to purchase any other merchandise, allowances or iTunes gifting. Data collection and use subject to Apple Customer Privacy Policy, see www.apple.com/privacy, unless stated otherwise. Risk of loss and title for code passes to purchaser on transfer. Codes are issued and managed by Apple Value Services, LLC (“Issuer”). Neither Apple nor Issuer is responsible for any loss or damage resulting from lost or stolen codes or use without permission. Apple and its licensees, affiliates, and licensors make no warranties, express or implied, with respect to code or the iTunes Store and disclaim any warranty to the fullest extent available. These limitations may not apply to you. Void where prohibited. Not for resale. Subject to full terms and conditions, see www.apple.com/legal/itunes/us/terms.html. Content and pricing subject to availability at the time of actual download. Content purchased from the iTunes Store is for personal lawful use only. Don’t steal music. © 2016 Apple Inc. All rights reserved.

brands.disclaimer:
iTunes® [http://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/fr/terms.html] est une marque déposée d'Apple Inc. Apple n'est pas associée a cette promotion et ne l'a commanditée d'aucune façon.

iTunes® [http://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/uk/terms.html] is a registered trademark of Apple Inc. All rights reserved.  Apple is not a participant in or sponsor of this promotion.
brands.description:
Les heureux destinataires peuvent utiliser leurs cadeaux iTunes aussi bien sur l’iTunes Store que sur l’App Store, le Mac App Store et iBooks. Sans carte bancaire. Il leur suffit de disposer d'un compte iTunes gratuit. Ils peuvent alors utiliser leur crédit comme bon leur semble pour télécharger musique, films, séries TV, apps, jeux, livres et plus encore.

 

Recipients can redeem and use their iTunes gifts on the iTunes Store, App Store, Mac App Store and iBooks. There’s no credit card required. All they need is a free iTunes account. And they can immediately use their gift credit for whatever they want — songs, films, TV programmes, apps, games, books and more.
brands.shortDescription:
Les cadeaux iTunes sont parfaits à titre d'encouragement, de remerciement ou de récompense pour d'excellents résultats. Les destinataires peuvent choisir exactement ce qui leur plaît : musique, films, séries TV, apps, jeux, livres et plus encore.

 

Give an iTunes Gift Card to the music lovers in your life and let them re-discover old favorites or keep up with the hottest hits. With the prepaid card, they can purchase songs from the #1 music download store and enjoy them anywhere with iPod or on their computers with iTunes for Mac or Windows.
brands.terms:
Cette carte n’est utilisable que sur le site français iTunes® Store. Pour utiliser cette carte, vous devez disposer d’un compte iTunes® et avoir accepté au préalable les conditions de licence et d’utilisation. Pour ouvrir un compte, vous devez être âgé(e) d’au moins 13 ans et résider en France. Le contenu et les prix sont sujets à disponibilité au moment du téléchargement effectif. Il est nécessaire de posséder le logiciel iTunes® 9.0 ou toute version ultérieure, des logiciels et matériels informatiques compatibles, ainsi qu’un accès Internet (des frais supplémentaires peuvent s’appliquer). Cette carte ne peut pas être rachetée, remboursée, échangée ou utilisée pour d’autres achats; elle ne permet pas d’obtenir les cadeaux mensuels ni les cadeaux iTunes®. Sauf indication contraire, la collecte et l’utilisation de données sont soumises à la Politique de Confidentialité Client d’Apple, consultable sur www.apple.com/fr/legal/privacy/. La propriété et les risques de perte des cartes sont transmis à  l’acheteur dès le transfert de la carte. iTunes® ne peut être tenu pour responsable des pertes ou des dommages résultant de la perte, du vol ou de l’utilisation des cartes sans votre autorisation. Vos droits légaux ne sont en rien modifiés. Les cartes ne peuvent être revendues. Les cartes iTunes® sont émises et fournies par iTunes® S.à.r.l. Le détaillant qui distribue les cartes agit en tant qu’agent au nom et pour le compte de iTunes® S.à.r.l. Pour l’intégralité des conditions générales, veuillez consulter http://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/fr/terms.html. Tout achat réalisé sur iTunes® Store est réservé à un usage strictement personnel et licite. Respectez la musique et ses auteurs. TM et © 2014 iTunes® S.à.r.l. Tous droits réservés.

 

This iTunes Gift Card is redeemable only on the iTunes Store for France. To redeem this card you must have an iTunes account, subject to prior acceptance of licence and usage terms. To open an account you must be above the age of 13 and in France. Content and pricing subject to availability at the time of actual download. iTunes 9.0 or later, compatible software and hardware, and Internet access (fees may apply) are required. This card cannot be redeemed for cash, returned for cash refund, exchanged, or used to purchase any other merchandise, provide monthly gifts or iTunes Gifting. Data collection and use subject to Apple Customer Privacy Policy, see www.apple.com/fr/legal/privacy/, unless stated otherwise. You will be responsible for this card after purchase. iTunes is not responsible for any loss or damage resulting from lost or stolen cards or use without your permission. Die Einlösung der iTunes-Karte gegen bar, die Rückgabe gegen Rückerstattung in bar oder der Umtausch bzw. die Verwendung der iTunes-Karte zum Kauf sonstiger Waren sowie die Einlösung in Monats-Kontoguthaben oder iTunes-Karten sind nicht möglich. brands.terms:
Questa carta iTunes può essere riscattata solo sull’iTunes Store Italia e scade dopo due anni dalla data (i) di emissione o, se successiva (ii) dell’ultima operazione effettuata su un account iTunes. Per riscattare questa carta è necessario avere un conto iTunes, soggetto a previa accettazione dei termini di licenza e d’uso. Per aprire un conto è necessario avere più di 13 anni e risiedere in Italia. Prezzi e contenuti sono quelli applicablili e disponibili del momento dell’effettivo download. È necessario essere in possesso di iTunes 9.0 o della versione successiva, di software e hardware compatibili e di accesso Internet (in relazione al quale potrebbero essere applicati costi e/o commissioni). Questa carta non può essere riscattata in cambio di denaro, rimborsata, scambiata nè utilizzata per acquistare alcun altro tipo di merce, regali mensili o buoni regalo iTunes. Salvo diversamente specificato, la raccolta e l’uso dei dati sono soggetti alla politica sulla riservatezza dei clienti Apple, vedere www.apple.com/it/legal/privacy/. Il rischio di perdita e il diritto di proprietà delle carte passano all’acquirente al momento del trasferimento. iTunes non è responsabile per eventuali perdite o danni risultanti dalla perdita o dal furto di una carta o dal suo uso senza autorizzazione. I diritti stabiliti dalla legge restano invariati. La carta non può essere rivenduta. Le carte iTunes vengono emesse e fornite da iTunes S.à.r.l. Per conoscere tutte le condizioni, vedere www.apple.com/legal/itunes/it/gifts.html. I contenuti acquistati dall’iTunes Store sono destinati a un utilizzo legale e personale. È vietato rubare contenuti musicali. TM e © 2014 iTunes S.à.r.l. Tutti i diritti riservati.

brands.terms:
Esta tarjeta iTunes se puede canjear solamente en el iTunes Store de España y caduca transcurridos dos años a partir de la fecha de (i) emisión o, si fuera posterior, (ii) transcurridos dos años a partir de la fecha en que se haya registrado la última actividad referida en una cuenta iTunes, cualquiera de los eventos que suceda en último lugar. Para canjear la tarjeta debe disponer de una cuenta iTunes sujeta a la previa aceptación de las condiciones de licencia y uso. Para abrir una cuenta debe tener más de 13 años y residir en España. El contenido y los precios están sujetos a disponibilidad en el momento efectivo de la descarga. Necesitará disponer de iTunes 9.0 o una versión posterior, software y hardware compatibles y acceso a Internet (que puede implicar el pago de una cuota de acceso a Internet de su proveedor habitual). Esta tarjeta no se puede canjear por efectivo, devolver para que se reintegre su importe en efectivo, intercambiar o utilizar para adquirir ninguna otra mercancía ni regalos mensuales o regalos iTunes. Salvo indicación en contrario, los datos recopilados y el uso que se haga de los mismos están sujetos a la Política de Privacidad de Clientes de Apple; consulte www.apple.com/es/legal/privacy/. El riesgo de pérdida y la titularidad de las tarjetas pasarán al comprador en caso de transmisión. iTunes no se responsabilizará de cualesquiera pérdidas o daños derivados de la pérdida, el robo o el uso no autorizado de las tarjetas. Los derechos que legalmente tenga atribuidos no se verán afectados por las presentes Condiciones. No está permitida la reventa de la tarjeta. Las tarjetas iTunes son emitidas y suministradas por iTunes S.à.r.l. Al distribuir las tarjetas, el minorista actúa como representante de iTunes S.à.r.l. Si desea conocer todas las condiciones, consulte www.apple.com/legal/itunes/es/gifts.html. El contenido del iTunes Store es únicamente para fines legales de ámbito personal. No robe contenido. Marca comercial y © 2014 iTunes S.à.r.l. Todos los derechos reservados.

brands.terms:
These terms and conditions apply to both Best Buy® physical and e-gift cards. The terms and conditions are subject to change at any time. Additional terms and conditions apply to e-gift cards.

  • Redeemable in any U.S. or Puerto Rico Best Buy® retail location or online at BestBuy.com where available for merchandise or services, including Magnolia Home Theater and Geek Squad®. Cannot be redeemed on prepaid open loop cards (sold in store only) or Marketplace items.
  • No expiration date, no fees.
  • Not redeemable for cash.
  • Lost, stolen or damaged cards replaced only with valid proof of purchase to extent of remaining card balance.
  • Not a credit or debit card.
  • Not valid as payment on Best Buy® credit card.
  • Best Buy® e-gift cards cannot be purchased with an international credit card.
  • Check balance at any U.S. or P.R. Best Buy® retail location, online at BestBuy.com, or call 1-888-716-7994. Must have card number available.
  • All terms enforced except where prohibited by law.
  • Purchases of physical or e-gift cards in any Best Buy® retail location or online at BestBuy.com are eligible for My Best Buy®™ points, excluding Best Buy® for Business or commercial purchases of gift cards.
  • Redeem up to 10 gift cards per transaction at BestBuy.com.

brands.disclaimer: The National Park Foundation is not a sponsor of the reward or promotion or otherwise affiliated with this company. The logo and other identifying marks attached are trademarks of and owned by The National Park Foundation and/or its affiliates. Please visit each organization’s website for additional terms and conditions.
brands.description:
Chartered by Congress in 1967, the National Park Foundation— official philanthropic partner of the National Park Service —works on behalf of America’s more than 400 national parks and their programs, safeguarding our heritage, and inspiring generations of national park enthusiasts. The National Park Foundation carries forth a legacy of support that began more than a century ago, when private citizens took action to establish and protect our treasured national parks. The Foundation fulfills its mission in partnership with the National Park Service and with countless affiliated local park Friends Groups, funding programs that promote leadership and innovation in conservation and preservation, educate youth and adults alike, encourage volunteerism, enhance the park visitor experience, and connect diverse communities to our shared heritage. *

Any donation made to National Park Foundation through this company will be made anonymously
brands.shortDescription: The National Park Foundation, in partnership with the National Park Service, enriches America’s national parks and programs through private support, protecting America’s special places, connecting people to parks, and inspiring the next generation of park stewards. Any donation made to National Park Foundation through this company will be made anonymously

brands.disclaimer: The Nature Conservancy is not a sponsor of the reward or promotion or otherwise affiliated with this company. The logo and other identifying marks attached are trademarks of and owned by The Nature Conservancy and/or its affiliates. Please visit each organization’s website for additional terms and conditions.
brands.description:
The Nature Conservancy is the leading conservation organization working around the world to protect ecologically important lands and waters for nature and people. We address the most pressing conservation threats at the largest scale and envision a world where the diversity of life thrives, and people act to conserve nature for its own sake and its ability to fulfill our needs and enrich our lives.

With the support of more than 1 million members, the Conservancy has built a tremendous record of success since its founding in 1951. Specifically, the Conservancy has protected more than 119 million acres of land and thousands of miles of rivers worldwide, works in 69 countries protecting habitats from grasslands to coral reefs, and addresses threats to conservation involving climate change, fresh water, oceans and conservation lands.
brands.shortDescription: The Nature Conservancy is the leading conservation organization working around the world to protect ecologically important lands and waters for nature and people. We address the most pressing conservation threats at the largest scale and envision a world where the diversity of life thrives, and people act to conserve nature for its own sake and its ability to fulfill our needs and enrich our lives. To learn more, please visit www.nature.org.
